column4: is anyone else besides me in this channel Canadian? I have a quick couple question.
and you'll only talk to a Canadian?
no, ca.archives.ubuntu.com isn't working for me and I
*I'm just curious if it's only me, eh?
it was just funny how you phrased your question? :)
ask away.. if someone knows the answer they'll get back with you.
can you tell me how you'd go about doing this?
after opening synaptic go to "settings/repositories" ten in the middle of the box you'll see Download from: pick there or have it search for the best mirror for your location
typing and refrencing as fast as I can

nothing really for now, I'll let you know if something does come up ;)
